-- This file is generated from Test.ump --

 -- This defines a NuSMV module for State --
 MODULE State

    -- This part declares input variables for the given NuSMV module --
   IVAR
     event : { assignSeat , cancel , checkIn , complete };
    
    -- This part declares state variables for the given NuSMV module --
   VAR
     state : { newBooking , seatAssigned , checkedIn , cancelled , completed };
    
    -- This part defines macros that summarize the transitions of the given NuSMV module --
   DEFINE
     t1 := event = assignSeat & state = newBooking;
     t2 := event = cancel & state = newBooking;
     t3 := event = cancel & state = seatAssigned;
     t4 := event = checkIn & state = seatAssigned;
     t5 := event = cancel & state = checkedIn;
     t6 := event = complete & state = checkedIn;
  
    -- This part defines the transitions from states to states for the given NuSMV module --
   ASSIGN
     init( state ) := newBooking;
     next( state ) := case
       t1 : seatAssigned;
       t4 : checkedIn;
       t3 | t2 | t5 : cancelled;
       t6 : completed;
       TRUE : state;
     esac;
 
    
 -- This defines a NuSMV module for main --
 MODULE main

    -- This part declares state variables for the given NuSMV module --
   VAR
     state : State;
    
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( state.state = newBooking )
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( state.state = seatAssigned )
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( state.state = checkedIn )
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( state.state = cancelled )
   CTLSPEC   EF  ( state.state = completed )
